alert.note: Alert for Allendale (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 19 at 3:23PM EDT until October 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...In Georgia, Jenkins, Screven, Candler and Bulloch Counties. In South Carolina, Allendale County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
